      • getWorldBoundsBack

        public IRectangle2f getWorldBoundsBack()
        Description copied from interface: ICameraProps
        Useful when the result will not be assigned.

        Caution: The result may be modified over time.
        Preferable use of #getWorldBounds(IMutableRectangle2f) is recommended.
        Specified by:
        getWorldBoundsBack in interface ICameraProps
        Returns:
        The backing object for the camera bounds.
